WorkItem.Description:
Rawr says I should be doing 47k, xml located at: http://pastebin.com/GvYr7f6p
I am not aware of why it says I should be doing 47k, sorry.
Â 
Recklessness tooltip is incorrect/not up to date (and value of dps given by selecting it seems pretty low, but could be right - unsure)
Inner Rage tooltip also incorrect, reduce CD on Cleave/HS to 1.5s for 15 sec on 30 sec cooldown...timing use of it could be hard, I suppose that's why it's not modeled yet...
Typo in Berserker Rage tooltip (tage)
Switching tabs in Instructions tab makes tabs and parent tabs disappear

Comments.Message: Assuming your toon is an Arms specced warrior,  since Fury has an issue alrdy for no or low DPS. Rather than posting your toon's html on some outside website, please attach the file to a comment here for ease of downloading/troubleshooting.
There. I'm blind and didn't see the attach thing at first.

1) Loading your character file, I don't get 47k, I get 27k
2) Recklessness tooltip and modelling updated for next version
3) Inner Rate tooltip and modelling updated for next version
4) Fixed the typo in Berserker Rage tooltip
5) Switching tabs in Instructions shouldn't be making the tabs disappear, it's probably just scrolling down where the tabs are out of view, scroll back up to see them
Marking fixed unless you have a different file that can show 47k
